  sname
  animCollapse
  stype
  boolean
  sinputtype
  truefalse
  sgroup
  FieldSet
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@
<tt>true</tt> to animate the transition when the panel is collapsed, <tt>false</tt> to skip the
animation (defaults to <tt>false</tt>).
#$@text#$@

(defaults to <tt>'[checkbox id]-checkbox'</tt>).
